#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

while(1)
{
long long unsigned int a,b,t1,t2,temp=0;
scanf("%llu %llu", &a, &b);
if(a>0 && b>0)
{

  int count=0;
   t1=1,t2=2;
   while(1)
   {

    if(t1>b)
    break;

    if(t1>=a)
            count++;

        temp=t1;
        t1=t2;
        t2=t1+temp;




   }

    cout<<count<<endl;
}

else
break;
}
return 0;
}
